predicate.note: Frames file for 'bark' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 10.7 (totally bogus), 37.3, 40.8.3-2; Framenet entry Communication noise and Perception noise.

roleset.name: like a dog
roleset.note: Since when did John have a dog?

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary barked orders to John, which he dutifully ignored.

example.name: stupid idioms
example.text: They are barking up the wrong tree, because it is basically their fault they can't attract new employees.
example.arg: because it is basically their fault they can't attract new employees
